description: This file is a configuration script for Vite, a build tool, specifically for a Qwik project. It defines build settings, plugin configurations, dependency management, and utility functions related to package dependencies.

methods.name: errorOnDuplicatesPkgDeps
methods.description: Function to identify duplicate dependencies and throw an error if any dependencies are listed in both devDependencies and dependencies, or if certain qwik packages are misplaced.
